original: shes rab ste zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyis so //
analyzed: shes rab ste zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyis so //
translated: It is by wisdom, by uncontaminated wisdom.

original: bden pa'i ming brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bden pa'i ming brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to express the name of the truth,

original: sdug bsngal sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang // zhes smos pa yin te //
analyzed: sdug bsngal sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang // zhes smos pa yin te //
translated: is stated.

original: shes rab kyis ni mthong gyur pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyis ni mthong gyur pa //
translated: It is seen by means of wisdom.

original: zhes bya ba rjes su 'jug pa yin no //🔽yan lag brgyad ces bya ba la yan lag ni cha yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba rjes su 'jug pa yin no // yan lag brgyad ces bya ba la yan lag ni cha yin te /
translated: This is the application.

original: yan lag brgyad gang la yod pa ste /
analyzed: yan lag brgyad gang la yod pa ste /
translated: It is called the eightfold path because it has eight members.

original: tshogs pa yan lag dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: tshogs pa yan lag dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: It is a collection that has members.

original: yan lag drug dang ldan pa'i phyi ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: yan lag drug dang ldan pa'i phyi ma lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the latter, which has six members.

original: lam ji lta bur gyur pa shes rab kyis mthong ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: lam ji lta bur gyur pa shes rab kyis mthong ba yin zhe na /
translated: In what way is the path seen by means of wisdom?

original: smras pa / 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas thob par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir bde ba yin no //
analyzed: smras pa / 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas thob par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir bde ba yin no //
translated: It is said: It is happiness because it causes the attainment of the state of fearlessness.

original: de dag kho na la mya ngan 'das 'gro ba zhes smos te /
analyzed: de dag kho na la mya ngan 'das 'gro ba zhes smos te /
translated: It is called the going to nirvana.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa yin no //
translated: It causes the attainment of nirvana.

original: sngar bshad pa de dag khas blangs pa'i tshul gyis lam mngon sum du byed pa dang / de dag nyid skyabs kyi mchog yin pa dang / skyabs kyi mchog yin pas de dag la brten pas /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa de dag khas blangs pa'i tshul gyis lam mngon sum du byed pa dang / de dag nyid skyabs kyi mchog yin pa dang / skyabs kyi mchog yin pas de dag la brten pas /
translated: The path is actualized by the method of accepting what was previously explained, and those very things are the supreme refuge.

original: sdug bsngal ma lus pa bsal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ma lus pa bsal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all suffering is removed by relying on those supreme refuges.

original: de'i byin gyi rlabs las zhes bya ba ni cho 'phrul chen po'i gnas las so //
analyzed: de'i byin gyi rlabs las zhes bya ba ni cho 'phrul chen po'i gnas las so //
translated: From the blessing of that means from the site of the great miracle.

original: khyad par chen po khong du chud de zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gi don gyi rnam par bshad pa ni snga ma bzhin blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: khyad par chen po khong du chud de zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gi don gyi rnam par bshad pa ni snga ma bzhin blta bar bya'o //
translated: The explanation of the meaning of the words, “understanding the great distinction,” and so on, should be seen as before.

original: 'jig rten 'di rtag ces bya ba ni 'jig rten 'gyur ba med pas rtag pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di rtag ces bya ba ni 'jig rten 'gyur ba med pas rtag pa yin no //
translated: “ This world is permanent” means that the world is permanent because it is unchanging.

original: mi rtag pa zhes bya ba ni @123b 'phags pa'i lam med par rgyun chad par gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa zhes bya ba ni @123b 'phags pa'i lam med par rgyun chad par gyur pa yin no //
translated: “ Impermanent” means that it is interrupted without the noble path.

original: rtag pa nyid kyang ma yin zhes bya ba ni gcig tu rtag pa nyid ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: rtag pa nyid kyang ma yin zhes bya ba ni gcig tu rtag pa nyid ma yin pa ste /
translated: “ Neither permanent” means that it is not permanent in one way.

original: mu stegs byed kyis kun du brtags pa'i skye gnas las skyes nas de kun du brtags pa'i bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong zhing 'khor ba'i mthar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mu stegs byed kyis kun du brtags pa'i skye gnas las skyes nas de kun du brtags pa'i bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong zhing 'khor ba'i mthar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are born from the birth-source imagined by the tīrthikas, and they experience the pleasure and pain imagined by the tīrthikas, and they bring about the end of saṃsāra.

original: mi rtag pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni gcig tu mi rtag pa nyid ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: mi rtag pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni gcig tu mi rtag pa nyid ma yin pa ste /
translated: They are not impermanent means they are not completely impermanent.

original: 'khor ba la yun ring du 'khor bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba la yun ring du 'khor bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they cause one to revolve for a long time in saṃsāra.

original: de rtag pa dang mi rtag pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de rtag pa dang mi rtag pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: They are permanent and impermanent means

original: gang dag gzhan gyis bcom pa'i sgo nas 'chi ba med pa de dag ni rtag pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gang dag gzhan gyis bcom pa'i sgo nas 'chi ba med pa de dag ni rtag pa nyid yin no //
translated: those who die by being killed by others are permanent.

original: gang dag yod pa de dag ni mi rtag pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gang dag yod pa de dag ni mi rtag pa nyid yin no //
translated: Those who die by their own nature are impermanent.

original: mtha' dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni mu stegs byed kyis kun du brtags pa'i bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong nas 'jig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtha' dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni mu stegs byed kyis kun du brtags pa'i bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong nas 'jig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They have an end means they perish after experiencing the pleasure and pain imagined by the tīrthikas.

original: mtha' dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba mang ba nyid kyi phyir dang / yun ring du gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtha' dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba mang ba nyid kyi phyir dang / yun ring du gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Having an end” means that it is subject to the experience of pleasure and pain, and it endures for a long time.

original: mtha' dang ldan pa dang mtha' dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ba ni pha rol gyis bcom pa'i 'chi ba mtha' dang ldan pa yin la /
analyzed: mtha' dang ldan pa dang mtha' dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ba ni pha rol gyis bcom pa'i 'chi ba mtha' dang ldan pa yin la /
translated: “Having an end and not having an end” means that death by violence has an end,

original: pha rol gyis bcom pa 'chi ba med pa ni mtha' dang mi ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: pha rol gyis bcom pa 'chi ba med pa ni mtha' dang mi ldan pa yin no //
translated: but death without violence does not have an end.

original: mtha' dang ldan pa yang ma yin la mtha' dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mtha' dang ldan pa yang ma yin la mtha' dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: “Neither having an end nor not having an end” means that

original: gcig tu mtha' dang ldan pa ma yin ba ste /
analyzed: gcig tu mtha' dang ldan pa ma yin ba ste /
translated: it is not entirely without an end,

original: 'khor ba'i dus ring ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i dus ring ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the time of cyclic existence is long.

original: mtha' dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: mtha' dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that it does not have an end,

original: gdon mi za bar chad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar chad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is certain that it will end.

original: srog gang yin pa de zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: srog gang yin pa de zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As for the statement, “That which is life force . . . ,”

original: srog ni 'dir bdag la 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: srog ni 'dir bdag la 'dod pa yin no //
translated: here life force refers to the self.

original: bdag 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs la ;
analyzed: bdag 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs la ;
translated: Here, I and so on.

original: bdag kyang bdag nyid du 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag kyang bdag nyid du 'dod pa yin no //
translated: I is asserted to be the self.

original: yod ces bya ba ni dus cung zhig gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod ces bya ba ni dus cung zhig gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Existence is because it abides for a while.

original: med ces bya ba ni dus cung zad gnas nas yang med pa yin no //
analyzed: med ces bya ba ni dus cung zad gnas nas yang med pa yin no //
translated: Non-existence is because after abiding for a while, it becomes non-existent.

original: yod pa nyid kyang ma yin zhes bya ba ni gcig tu yod pa ma yin te chang pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa nyid kyang ma yin zhes bya ba ni gcig tu yod pa ma yin te chang pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Neither existence nor non-existence is because it is not exclusively existent, being a pot,

original: med pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: med pa yang ma yin te /
translated: and it is not exclusively non-existent,

original: gcig tu med pa yin pas na gnas skabs gzhan ngag kyang srid pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig tu med pa yin pas na gnas skabs gzhan ngag kyang srid pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because another state is also possible.

original: 'di nyid bden gyi zhes bya ba ni don dam par ro //
analyzed: 'di nyid bden gyi zhes bya ba ni don dam par ro //
translated: This alone is true is in the ultimate sense.

original: gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi gzhung brdzun pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi gzhung brdzun pa'o //
translated: The other is delusion is the false doctrine of others.

original: drag tu song ngo zhes bya ba ni mgyogs par song ba yin no //🔽rva las gyur @124a * //
analyzed: drag tu song ngo zhes bya ba ni mgyogs par song ba yin no // rva las gyur @124a * //
translated: Gone with force means gone quickly.

original: pa'i dregs pa ni rva'i dregs pa yin te /
analyzed: pa'i dregs pa ni rva'i dregs pa yin te /
translated: The haughtiness that arises from horns is the haughtiness of horns.

original: rva'i dregs pa chags pa gang la yod pa de ni rva'i dregs pa chags pa 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: rva'i dregs pa chags pa gang la yod pa de ni rva'i dregs pa chags pa 'dra ba ste /
translated: He who has the pride of a peacock, that is, who is like the pride of a peacock,

original: khyod de dang 'dra bar ro //
analyzed: khyod de dang 'dra bar ro //
translated: you are like that.

original: skye bo bseng bseng por zhes bya ba ni gzi dang bral zhing mdangs med par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: skye bo bseng bseng por zhes bya ba ni gzi dang bral zhing mdangs med par gyur pa'o //
translated: The one who is pale, is one who is without luster, who has become without radiance.

original: sh'akya ni bcom ldan 'das yin la /🔽de'i chos ni bstan pa'i chos sam /
analyzed: sh'akya ni bcom ldan 'das yin la / de'i chos ni bstan pa'i chos sam /
translated: The Shakya is the Lord Buddha.🔽His Dharma is the Dharma of teaching,

original: dam pa'i chos de ma shes pas so //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos de ma shes pas so //
translated: or it is the true Dharma.

original: ngo tsha yon tan thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa de med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dzem med yin no //
analyzed: ngo tsha yon tan thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa de med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dzem med yin no //
translated: The one who is without shame is the one who is without that shame which is the root of all good qualities.

original: kye 'dzem med bong bu bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bong bu ji lta ba de bzhin du khyod 'khyam pa ste rgyu bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: kye 'dzem med bong bu bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bong bu ji lta ba de bzhin du khyod 'khyam pa ste rgyu bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: Oh, you who are shameless, you wander about like a donkey, that is, you move about just like a donkey.

original: bdag gi mdun 'dug khyod ni bdud du nges //
analyzed: bdag gi mdun 'dug khyod ni bdud du nges //
translated: You are surely Mara, sitting in front of me!

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: gang gi phyir bdag gi mdun du 'dug pa'i 'chi bdag nges par te gdon mi za bar lhag ma'i de ma thag tu gyur pa yin pas na kho bo 'chi ba'i phyir yang dag par gnas par gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bdag gi mdun du 'dug pa'i 'chi bdag nges par te gdon mi za bar lhag ma'i de ma thag tu gyur pa yin pas na kho bo 'chi ba'i phyir yang dag par gnas par gyur pa yin no //
translated: Because the Lord of Death, who is seated in front of me, is certain, i.e., without doubt, to come immediately after the remainder of my life is over, I am truly situated in the face of death.

original: mthu ni lus kyi stobs yin la /
analyzed: mthu ni lus kyi stobs yin la /
translated: Power is the strength of the body.

original: brtson pa ni spro ba yin no //
analyzed: brtson pa ni spro ba yin no //
translated: Exertion is enthusiasm.

original: dngos po kun la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dngos po kun la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With regard to all things, etc.

original: 'ga' zhig 'dus byas kyi dngos por gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad nyid skyid sdug gi skal ba can yin la /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig 'dus byas kyi dngos por gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad nyid skyid sdug gi skal ba can yin la /
translated: Whatever things are conditioned, all of them are subject to pleasure and pain.

original: bdag gis kyang bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong nas /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong nas /
translated: I have experienced pleasure and pain.

original: da ni sdug bsngal las bdag grol ba yin no //
analyzed: da ni sdug bsngal las bdag grol ba yin no //
translated: Now I am free from pain.

original: bde ba'i phyir ni thar pa'i phyir 'gro ba yin no //
analyzed: bde ba'i phyir ni thar pa'i phyir 'gro ba yin no //
translated: I am going for the sake of happiness, i.e., for the sake of liberation.

original: gzir te 'od zer rab tu tsha bas so //
analyzed: gzir te 'od zer rab tu tsha bas so //
translated: I am oppressed by the hot rays.

original: de gang gi 'od zer yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang gi 'od zer yin zhe na /
translated: Whose rays?

original: nyi ma zhes smos pa yin no //
analyzed: nyi ma zhes smos pa yin no //
translated: The rays of the sun.

original: mi srun pa ni sems rab tu rtsub pa yin la de spangs pa ste yongs su btang nas rdzing bu de dag na yod pa de myur du ston cig ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: mi srun pa ni sems rab tu rtsub pa yin la de spangs pa ste yongs su btang nas rdzing bu de dag na yod pa de myur du ston cig ces bya ba yin no //
translated: The wicked are those whose minds are very rough. Having abandoned them, having given them up, quickly show me that which is in those ponds.

original: chu gtsang ba ni chu yongs su dag pa yin la /
analyzed: chu gtsang ba ni chu yongs su dag pa yin la /
translated: Pure water is completely pure water.

original: bsil ba nyid kyi phyir gangs kyi chu lta bu'o //
analyzed: bsil ba nyid kyi phyir gangs kyi chu lta bu'o //
translated: Because it is cool, it is like snow water.

original: chu la gnas pa ni ngang pa yin la /
analyzed: chu la gnas pa ni ngang pa yin la /
translated: Those who live in the water are geese.

original: padma ni me tog yin te /
analyzed: padma ni me tog yin te /
translated: A lotus is a flower.

original: padma dang ldan pa ni padma can yin no //
analyzed: padma dang ldan pa ni padma can yin no //
translated: One who has a lotus is lotus-like.

original: rab tu gtsang ba ni shin tu gtsang ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu gtsang ba ni shin tu gtsang ba'o //
translated: Very pure is extremely pure.

original: kye skyes bu tha ma /
analyzed: kye skyes bu tha ma /
translated: O man, you are the worst!

original: kye skyes bu sdig can /
analyzed: kye skyes bu sdig can /
translated: O man, you are sinful!

original: kye skyes bu bden pa med pas so //🔽ma ning nyid yin pa'i phyir pho min pa yin la /
analyzed: kye skyes bu bden pa med pas so // ma ning nyid yin pa'i phyir pho min pa yin la /
translated: O man, you are not truthful!🔽Because he is a eunuch, he is not a man.

original: skyes pa'i gzugs yod pa nyid kyi phyir skyes pa'i chung ma min pa yin no //
analyzed: skyes pa'i gzugs yod pa nyid kyi phyir skyes pa'i chung ma min pa yin no //
translated: Because he has the form of a man, he is not a woman.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs su ston pa zhes bya ba ni phan tshun 'gal bar lung 'bogs pa'i phyir ro //

translated: Deportment is the change in speech.

original: bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa yongs su gcod par byed pa ni mkhas pa yin la /
analyzed: bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa yongs su gcod par byed pa ni mkhas pa yin la /
translated: The wise are those who determine what should and should not be done.

original: mdzangs pa ni kun du spyod pa la byang bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: mdzangs pa ni kun du spyod pa la byang bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: The clever are those who are skilled in practice.

original: dpyod pa dang ldan pa ni 'bras bu'i mthar thug par dpyod pa la mkhas pa yin no //
analyzed: dpyod pa dang ldan pa ni 'bras bu'i mthar thug par dpyod pa la mkhas pa yin no //
translated: The discerning are those who are skilled in discerning the culmination of the result.

original: bsams nas zhes bya ba ni rtsol bar byed pa'am ches par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bsams nas zhes bya ba ni rtsol bar byed pa'am ches par gyur pa'o //
translated: Having reflected means having made an effort or having become certain.

original: pha'i pha ni mes po yin la /
analyzed: pha'i pha ni mes po yin la /
translated: The grandfather is the father’s father.

original: mes po'i rgyal srid ni mes po'i rgyal srid do //
analyzed: mes po'i rgyal srid ni mes po'i rgyal srid do //
translated: The kingdom of the grandfather is the kingdom of the grandfather.

original: sman chen po zhes bya ba ni sman thams cad pas yon tan chen po dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir sman chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sman chen po zhes bya ba ni sman thams cad pas yon tan chen po dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir sman chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: The great medicine is called great because it possesses great qualities among all medicines.

original: nya'i rus pa zhes bya ba ni nya nag po'i sgal pa'i dum bu yin no //
analyzed: nya'i rus pa zhes bya ba ni nya nag po'i sgal pa'i dum bu yin no //
translated: The bone of the fish is a piece of the backbone of a black fish.

original: rin chen 'dra bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
analyzed: rin chen 'dra bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
translated: The verse begins, “Like jewels, etc.”

original: de dag rin po che ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de dag rin po che ni ma yin gyi /
translated: They are not jewels,

original: 'on kyang nya'i rus pa bsgyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang nya'i rus pa bsgyur ba yin no //
translated: but rather the bones of fish.

original: bsgyur ba zhes bya ba ni dmar por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bsgyur ba zhes bya ba ni dmar por gyur pa'o //
translated: “Like” means “red.”

original: las ni ma byas par zhes bya ba la 'gro ba'i las so //
analyzed: las ni ma byas par zhes bya ba la 'gro ba'i las so //
translated: “Action” means the action of going.

original: mig mi 'dzums pa ni nya nyid do //
analyzed: mig mi 'dzums pa ni nya nyid do //
translated: “Without winking” is the nature of fish.

original: brtag pa zhes bya ba ni dpyad pa'o //🔽rnam thos bag med spyod pa yin //
analyzed: brtag pa zhes bya ba ni dpyad pa'o // rnam thos bag med spyod pa yin //
translated: “Examination” means investigation.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: “Vaisravana” is the son of a god.

original: rin po che bsdu ba la rnam thos kyi bu bag med pas gnas pa ma yin pa de'i phyir rin po che ma yin no //
analyzed: rin po che bsdu ba la rnam thos kyi bu bag med pas gnas pa ma yin pa de'i phyir rin po che ma yin no //
translated: “Without carelessness” means that Vaisravana does not live carelessly. Therefore, they are not jewels.

original: 'dug pa zhes bya ba ni 'khod par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'dug pa zhes bya ba ni 'khod par gyur pa'o //
translated: “Sitting” means sitting down.

original: bya dkar ni bya'i rigs dkar po'o //
analyzed: bya dkar ni bya'i rigs dkar po'o //
translated: “White birds” are birds of a white species.

original: rnyed par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni kun du lta ba dang / 'phur bas gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir padma'i 'dab ma rnyings par gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: rnyed par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni kun du lta ba dang / 'phur bas gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir padma'i 'dab ma rnyings par gyur pa yin no //
translated: “One will find” means that the petals of the lotus will wither because of the looking around and flying about.

original: 'phur ba ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'phur ba ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar gyur pa'o //
translated: Flying means going through the sky.

original: khar ba'i snod ni khar pa las byas pa'i snod chen po'o //
analyzed: khar ba'i snod ni khar pa las byas pa'i snod chen po'o //
translated: A pot is a large vessel made of Kharpara.

original: bum pa ni ming rab tu grags pa yin no //
analyzed: bum pa ni ming rab tu grags pa yin no //
translated: A pot is a well-known name.

original: bye'u ni bya'i bye brag yin no //
analyzed: bye'u ni bya'i bye brag yin no //
translated: A bird is a type of bird.

original: lug thug ces bya ba ni rva shin tu che ba'i lug thug yin no //
analyzed: lug thug ces bya ba ni rva shin tu che ba'i lug thug yin no //
translated: A ram is a ram with very large horns.

original: krung krung zhes bya ba ni chu dogs ni rgyu ba dkar la che ba'i bya'i bye brag yin no //
analyzed: krung krung zhes bya ba ni chu dogs ni rgyu ba dkar la che ba'i bya'i bye brag yin no //
translated: A crane is a type of white bird that moves on dry land.

original: rab tu spyod pa'i sa ni 'dir bshad pa'i sa la 'dod do //
analyzed: rab tu spyod pa'i sa ni 'dir bshad pa'i sa la 'dod do //
translated: The stage of practice is accepted as the stage explained here.

original: ngan pa zhes bya ba ni khyod gzugs byad mdzes pa la sogs pa'i dngos por yod na zhes smos pa yin no //
analyzed: ngan pa zhes bya ba ni khyod gzugs byad mdzes pa la sogs pa'i dngos por yod na zhes smos pa yin no //
translated: Bad means if you exist as a thing with a beautiful form and so on.

original: khyod 'gro bas dub pas phyin ci log tu mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gzhan nyid du shes par gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: khyod 'gro bas dub pas phyin ci log tu mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gzhan nyid du shes par gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: You see wrongly because of going. It is said that you should know in another way.

original: bram ze ma yin pas byas so @126b zhes bya ba ni bram ze la legs pa ni bram ze yin la /
analyzed: bram ze ma yin pas byas so @126b zhes bya ba ni bram ze la legs pa ni bram ze yin la /
translated: The phrase not a brahmin means that he is not a brahmin.

original: bram zer ma gyur pa ni bram ze ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: bram zer ma gyur pa ni bram ze ma yin pa ste /
translated: The phrase not a brahmin means that he is not a brahmin.

original: 'dis ni bram ze dang 'gal ba'i kun du spyod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni bram ze dang 'gal ba'i kun du spyod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: This is the practice that is contrary to the brahmins, up to this point.

original: brdzun ni bden pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: brdzun ni bden pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Lying means that which is not true.

original: chung ma ni 'dir mi skor byas pa yin no //
analyzed: chung ma ni 'dir mi skor byas pa yin no //
translated: Here, wife means a woman who is not related to one by kinship or religion.

original: brtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni dpyad par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni dpyad par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to test means in order to examine.

original: nan gyis zhes bya ba ni stobs kyis so //
analyzed: nan gyis zhes bya ba ni stobs kyis so //
translated: Forcefully means by power.

original: ltad mo ni mthong ba nyid du mngon par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: ltad mo ni mthong ba nyid du mngon par 'dod pa'o //
translated: A spectacle means that which is desired to be seen.

original: aarga ni chu'i nang du 'bras dkar po bcug pa rkang pa'i 'og tu 'jog pa'i sgo nas mchod pa sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: aarga ni chu'i nang du 'bras dkar po bcug pa rkang pa'i 'og tu 'jog pa'i sgo nas mchod pa sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: Arga means a kind of offering that is made by placing white rice in water under one's feet.

original: rkang pa'i mchod pa ni rkang pa la 'os pa'i mchod pa'o //
analyzed: rkang pa'i mchod pa ni rkang pa la 'os pa'i mchod pa'o //
translated: Foot worship means worship that is suitable for the feet.

original: phan 'dogs par byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'di bdag la phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas nas so //
analyzed: phan 'dogs par byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'di bdag la phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas nas so //
translated: The phrase one who is helpful refers to the thought, This person will be helpful to me.

original: rkun po lnga brgya sa'i dong du bcug pas so zhes bya ba ni sa'i thabs su bcug par gyur pas so //
analyzed: rkun po lnga brgya sa'i dong du bcug pas so zhes bya ba ni sa'i thabs su bcug par gyur pas so //
translated: The phrase five hundred thieves were buried in a pit means that they were placed in a hole in the ground.

original: mthong nas zhes bya ba ni rkun po'i mngon sum du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: mthong nas zhes bya ba ni rkun po'i mngon sum du gyur pa yin no //
translated: The phrase having seen them means that the thieves were in the presence of the king.

original: mthong par 'dod de zhes bya ba ni ji ltar kyang rung ste /
analyzed: mthong par 'dod de zhes bya ba ni ji ltar kyang rung ste /
translated: The phrase desiring to see them means that the king wanted to see them in any way possible.

original: bdag gi don bsgrub par nus par gyur ro zhes ngag sgrub par byed pa'i yul la 'dod pa yin par rig par bya'o //🔽blo rtsing la zhes bya ba ni blo dman pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag gi don bsgrub par nus par gyur ro zhes ngag sgrub par byed pa'i yul la 'dod pa yin par rig par bya'o // blo rtsing la zhes bya ba ni blo dman pa yin no //
translated: The phrase in order to accomplish his own purpose means that the king wanted to accomplish his purpose by means of the thieves.🔽 The phrase a slow-witted means a person of little intelligence.

original: spyod pa ni gsal ba zhes bya ba ni yongs su gcod par byed pa bul pa yin no //
analyzed: spyod pa ni gsal ba zhes bya ba ni yongs su gcod par byed pa bul pa yin no //
translated: The phrase a slow-witted person means a person who is slow to understand.

original: them pa ni 'dir sgo gtan yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: them pa ni 'dir sgo gtan yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: The phrase a door bolt means a door bar.

original: pags pa las byas pa bcug pa du ma can btsag pa'i thabs su gyur pa ni ko tshags yin no //
analyzed: pags pa las byas pa bcug pa du ma can btsag pa'i thabs su gyur pa ni ko tshags yin no //
translated: A pile of hides is a collection of hides that have been put together in order to be sold.

original: rtogs pa ni phyogs gcig khong du chud pas don mang po rtogs par nus pa yin la /
analyzed: rtogs pa ni phyogs gcig khong du chud pas don mang po rtogs par nus pa yin la /
translated: Understanding is the ability to understand many things by understanding one thing.

original: sel ba ni don de dag kho na yongs su gcod par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sel ba ni don de dag kho na yongs su gcod par byed pa yin no //
translated: Exclusion is the complete determination of those things.

original: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad la byang ba ni tshul dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad la byang ba ni tshul dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: One who is skilled in worldly conventions is one who is proper.

original: dul bar gyur pa ni cho ga dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: dul bar gyur pa ni cho ga dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: One who is disciplined is one who is correct.

original: gang na 'bras bu can gyi shing yod pa de ni skyed mos tshal yin la /
analyzed: gang na 'bras bu can gyi shing yod pa de ni skyed mos tshal yin la /
translated: A garden is a place where there are fruit trees.

original: nags ni 'bras bu med pa'i shing gi tshogs yin no //
analyzed: nags ni 'bras bu med pa'i shing gi tshogs yin no //
translated: A forest is a collection of trees that do not bear fruit.

original: shin tu gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba ni legs par shin tu gzhon nur gyur pa ste /🔽smes kyi kun nas slong ba'am lung 'bogs pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: shin tu gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba ni legs par shin tu gzhon nur gyur pa ste / smes kyi kun nas slong ba'am lung 'bogs pa nyid la'o //
translated: One who is very young is one who is very young in a good way.🔽One who is very old is one who is very old in a bad way.

original: blun te zhes bya ba ni dman par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: blun te zhes bya ba ni dman par gyur pa'o //
translated: One who is foolish is one who is inferior.

original: rgyal chos byin gyis brlabs pa las byung ba ni bsgrubs pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyal chos byin gyis brlabs pa las byung ba ni bsgrubs pa yin no //
translated: The king’s Dharma is the consecration that arises from the practice.

original: smra zhing zhes bya ba ni tshul ma yin pa'i sgras brjod par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: smra zhing zhes bya ba ni tshul ma yin pa'i sgras brjod par byed pa yin no //
translated: “He speaks” means he expresses himself with improper speech.

original: lus la chad pa zhes bya ba ni @127a * //
analyzed: lus la chad pa zhes bya ba ni @127a * //
translated: “He cuts off his body” means

original: bros par gyur na dus phyis khyod kyi lus thams cad du gzung bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: bros par gyur na dus phyis khyod kyi lus thams cad du gzung bar bya ba'o //
translated: “If you run away, later I will seize your entire body.”

original: da ni di la mi rung zhes bya ba ni snga ma de dag thams cad la thabs nyid yod kyi 'di la ni thabs yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: da ni di la mi rung zhes bya ba ni snga ma de dag thams cad la thabs nyid yod kyi 'di la ni thabs yod pa ma yin no //
translated: “Now it is not suitable” means that for all the previous ones there is a method, but for this one there is no method.

original: thag nye bar zhes bya ba ni gam phyi dag tu'o //
analyzed: thag nye bar zhes bya ba ni gam phyi dag tu'o //
translated: “Nearby” means in front or behind.

original: rnam pa bdun du bskor ba byas nas zhes bya ba ni so sor tha dad par bskor ba'i phyir de dag rnam pa bdun du bgo ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa bdun du bskor ba byas nas zhes bya ba ni so sor tha dad par bskor ba'i phyir de dag rnam pa bdun du bgo ba yin no //
translated: “Having turned in seven directions” means that they are divided into seven parts.

original: btsag las sogs pas skra'i mtshams kyi gnas bsgyur ba dang mar gyis bskus nas so //
analyzed: btsag las sogs pas skra'i mtshams kyi gnas bsgyur ba dang mar gyis bskus nas so //
translated: “Having changed the place of the hair” means having changed the place of the hair by dyeing and so on, and having anointed it with butter.

original: phas bu grags par byed ces bya ba ni rab tu gsal bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: phas bu grags par byed ces bya ba ni rab tu gsal bar byed pa yin no //
translated: “The father makes the son famous” means he makes him very well known.

original: 'di'i blo mi 'jigs pa can zhes bya ba ni 'di'i shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i blo mi 'jigs pa can zhes bya ba ni 'di'i shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur pa'o //
translated: The expression “his mind is fearless” means that he is endowed with perfect wisdom.

original: mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ba ni mang du byas pa'i mkhas pa'i las dag la mkhas par gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ba ni mang du byas pa'i mkhas pa'i las dag la mkhas par gyur pa yin no //
translated: The expression “he is naturally wise” means that he is skilled in the many activities of the wise.

original: rig byed bzhi ni nges brjod dang / snyan dngags dang / mchod sbyin dang / srid srung gi rig byed yin no ;
analyzed: rig byed bzhi ni nges brjod dang / snyan dngags dang / mchod sbyin dang / srid srung gi rig byed yin no ;
translated: The four Vedas are the Rg Veda, the Yajur Veda, the Sama Veda, and the Atharva Veda.

original: / rig byed kyi yan lag drug ni skar ma'i bstan bcos dang / brda sprod pa dang / sdeb sbyor dang / nges brjod la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: / rig byed kyi yan lag drug ni skar ma'i bstan bcos dang / brda sprod pa dang / sdeb sbyor dang / nges brjod la sogs pa yin no //
translated: The six Vedangas are the Vedanta, Shiksha, Kalpa, Vyakarana, Chandas, and Geya.

original: gser gyi dong tse gna' ma ni rnying pa yin no //
analyzed: gser gyi dong tse gna' ma ni rnying pa yin no //
translated: The expression “old gold coins” means old coins.

original: sems kyi dogs pas zhes bya ba ni dogs pas bcom par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyi dogs pas zhes bya ba ni dogs pas bcom par gyur pa'o //
translated: The expression “his mind is troubled by doubts” means that his mind is overcome by doubts.

original: tshes grangs ni tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: tshes grangs ni tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la sogs pa yin no //
translated: The expression “auspicious day” means the eighth, fourteenth, and so on.

original: dus tshigs ni zla ba'i mtha' 'am /
analyzed: dus tshigs ni zla ba'i mtha' 'am /
translated: The expression “auspicious time” means the end of the month,

original: lo'i mtha' 'am /
analyzed: lo'i mtha' 'am /
translated: the end of the year,

original: lha la sogs pa'i nyi ma yin no //
analyzed: lha la sogs pa'i nyi ma yin no //
translated: or the day of a deity.

original: dga' ston ni 'ba' zhig pa yin no //
analyzed: dga' ston ni 'ba' zhig pa yin no //
translated: The festival is only joy.

original: nye reg byas te zhes bya ba ni rig byed las brjod pa snying ga'i phyogs khyab pa can gyi chus tha snyad du byed sgra dang bral ba lan gsum byas nas so //
analyzed: nye reg byas te zhes bya ba ni rig byed las brjod pa snying ga'i phyogs khyab pa can gyi chus tha snyad du byed sgra dang bral ba lan gsum byas nas so //
translated: Having touched means having done three times without the sound of words, with water that pervades the region of the heart, as stated in the Veda.

original: brda'i tshig tu zhes bya ba ni zol pa'i tshig tu'o //
analyzed: brda'i tshig tu zhes bya ba ni zol pa'i tshig tu'o //
translated: The word convention means a deceptive word.

original: mgo rdul gyis 'dres pa zhes bya ba ni mgo bo la rdul bskus nas so //
analyzed: mgo rdul gyis 'dres pa zhes bya ba ni mgo bo la rdul bskus nas so //
translated: Having mixed the head with dust means having smeared dust on the head.

original: mig zur ni 'dir smin ma bskyod pa dang / zur mig lta ba la sogs pa lus kyi 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: mig zur ni 'dir smin ma bskyod pa dang / zur mig lta ba la sogs pa lus kyi 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Here, winking is a bodily change, such as raising the eyebrows and casting sidelong glances.

original: rgod pa'i tshig ni 'dir 'dod chags kyis 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: rgod pa'i tshig ni 'dir 'dod chags kyis 'jug pa yin no //
translated: The word playful here means engaging with desire.

original: ldan pa ni kun nas 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: ldan pa ni kun nas 'brel pa'o //
translated: Possession means connection.

original: lhag par 'dri ba ni bsnyen par bkur yin no //
analyzed: lhag par 'dri ba ni bsnyen par bkur yin no //
translated: Asking in excess means being very respectful.

original: sdig pa zhi bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni bdag rku bar byed pa'i sdig pa zhi bar gyur pa yin pas na kho bo las 'di mi byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sdig pa zhi bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni bdag rku bar byed pa'i sdig pa zhi bar gyur pa yin pas na kho bo las 'di mi byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: May my sin be pacified means I will not do this act, since the sin of stealing from me is pacified.

original: khyab par gyur ces bya ba ni skye bo thams cad kyi mngon sum nyid du grags @127b pa skyes shing 'phel bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: khyab par gyur ces bya ba ni skye bo thams cad kyi mngon sum nyid du grags @127b pa skyes shing 'phel bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: “They will be widespread” means that they will be well known to all people and will increase.

original: blta ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni blta 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blta ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni blta 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “In order to see” means in order to see what is desired.

original: dbang du ni shin tu dbang du byed pa'o //
analyzed: dbang du ni shin tu dbang du byed pa'o //
translated: “Under control” means under complete control.

original: mi mthun par byos shig ces bya ba ni drang po ma yin par gyis shig pa yin no //
analyzed: mi mthun par byos shig ces bya ba ni drang po ma yin par gyis shig pa yin no //
translated: “Make them hostile” means make them dishonest.

original: mi 'jigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de dag la 'jigs par med pa'i phyag rgya dang / rnam par 'tshe ba spangs pa'i phyag rgya byin pa yin no //
analyzed: mi 'jigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de dag la 'jigs par med pa'i phyag rgya dang / rnam par 'tshe ba spangs pa'i phyag rgya byin pa yin no //
translated: “Fearless” and so on: they will be given a seal of fearlessness and a seal of freedom from violence.

original: dman pa ni dbul ba yin no //
analyzed: dman pa ni dbul ba yin no //
translated: “Poor” means destitute.

original: gter yod pa la longs spyod pa dang bral ba ni bkren pa yin no //
analyzed: gter yod pa la longs spyod pa dang bral ba ni bkren pa yin no //
translated: “Miserly” means lacking enjoyment of existing wealth.

original: lus la snyoms par byas pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rjes su mthun pa'i longs spyod dag gis 'phel bar byas pa yin no //
analyzed: lus la snyoms par byas pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rjes su mthun pa'i longs spyod dag gis 'phel bar byas pa yin no //
translated: “They will be satisfied with their bodies” means that they will be satisfied with their bodies as they are, without increasing them through enjoyment.

original: yid brtan par bya ba ni yid ches par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: yid brtan par bya ba ni yid ches par bya ba yin no //
translated: “To be trusted” means to be believed.

original: mthong ba ni rgyal po dang 'gal ba'i las so //
analyzed: mthong ba ni rgyal po dang 'gal ba'i las so //
translated: “To be seen” means to be seen by the king.

original: pha la dpyad nas zhes bya ba ni lkog tu skyon pa'i sgo nas nyes pa dang bcas par byed pa'o //
analyzed: pha la dpyad nas zhes bya ba ni lkog tu skyon pa'i sgo nas nyes pa dang bcas par byed pa'o //
translated: “Having examined the father” means having examined the father in secret.

analyzed: bu gu rna can ni 'dir rna ba gnyis la 'dod pa la bkab pa yang mdzes pa'i @128a * //

original: phyir yin no //
analyzed: phyir yin no //
translated: The boy with pierced ears is so called because his ears are pierced for the purpose of wearing earrings.

original: grong mi ni gtso bo yin no //
analyzed: grong mi ni gtso bo yin no //

analyzed: zhing thogs te sa bon tshol du song ngo zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: rang gi bud med kyi dbang po byin gyis brlabs pa ni zhing gi gnas yin la /

analyzed: skyes bu'i mi gtsang ba ni sa bon yin pa de bas na skyes bu gzhan gyi thad du song ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: The man’s impurity is the seed. Therefore, he went to another man.

original: thibs po med pa zhes bya ba ni rtsva la sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: thibs po med pa zhes bya ba ni rtsva la sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur pa'o //
translated: The field is without obstructions, that is, without grass, etc.

original: bde ba zhes bya ba ni 'tshe ba med pa med pa yin no //🔽chu'i rtsva srab mo gyon par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ma bkal zhing ma btags pa yin la /
analyzed: bde ba zhes bya ba ni 'tshe ba med pa med pa yin no // chu'i rtsva srab mo gyon par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ma bkal zhing ma btags pa yin la /
translated: It is pleasant, that is, without danger.🔽It is not plowed, that is, not covered with a thin layer of water, because it is covered with cotton.

analyzed: ras bal gyis gos med pa nyid kyi phyir ras bal ma yin pa'i gos gyon pa yin no //
translated: It is not cotton, that is, it is not covered with cotton cloth, because it is covered with cloth made from another material.

original: mig g-yas pa btsums pa nyid kyi phyir g-yon pa'i mig gcig pa yin no //
analyzed: mig g-yas pa btsums pa nyid kyi phyir g-yon pa'i mig gcig pa yin no //
translated: Because the right eye is closed, he has only one eye.

original: gang gis za ba zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yas pas za ba de'i phyir g-yas nas song shig ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gis za ba zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yas pas za ba de'i phyir g-yas nas song shig ces bya ba yin no //
translated: Because he eats with his right hand, he says, Go to the right.

original: gang gis za min zhes bya ba ni g-yon pas za ba ma yin pa de'i phyir g-yon pa'i lam spang bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gis za min zhes bya ba ni g-yon pas za ba ma yin pa de'i phyir g-yon pa'i lam spang bar bya ba yin no //
translated: Because he does not eat with his left hand, he says, Abandon the left path.

original: kham gyi nags can ni nas kyi zhing yin te /
analyzed: kham gyi nags can ni nas kyi zhing yin te /

original: gang gi phyir zas kyi chang bu sgrub par byed pa yin pa de'i phyir ro /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zas kyi chang bu sgrub par byed pa yin pa de'i phyir ro /

original: s'a lu'i nags ni s'a lu'i zhing yin no //
analyzed: s'a lu'i nags ni s'a lu'i zhing yin no //

analyzed: tshe bsgrub par bya ba'i don du nas dngos pa ni yos brjod pa yin no //
translated: The rabbit is mentioned as the substance of barley for the purpose of establishing life.

original: pa la sha ni shing pa la sha yin no //
analyzed: pa la sha ni shing pa la sha yin no //
translated: The palasha tree is a palasha tree.

original: khros nas zhes bya ba ni khros pa'i tshig gis rung bar byas pa yin no //
analyzed: khros nas zhes bya ba ni khros pa'i tshig gis rung bar byas pa yin no //
translated: Angry is the word for angry.

original: bsnyen pa ni nyung zad kyis so //
analyzed: bsnyen pa ni nyung zad kyis so //
translated: The little is the little.

original: rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba ni sems gzung bar bya ba'i lus dang ngag gi 'gyur ba rjes su mthun par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba ni sems gzung bar bya ba'i lus dang ngag gi 'gyur ba rjes su mthun par bya ba yin no //
translated: “Following” means to conform to the bodily and verbal changes that are to be grasped by the mind.

original: bstan bcos mang du zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos mang po la zlo sbyangs par gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: bstan bcos mang du zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos mang po la zlo sbyangs par gyur pa yin no //
translated: “Well-versed in many treatises” means to be skilled in the many treatises.

original: bu mo blang bar byas so zhes bya ba ni rig byed las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du'o //
analyzed: bu mo blang bar byas so zhes bya ba ni rig byed las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du'o //
translated: “The girl is to be taken” means in accordance with what is taught in the Vedas.

original: bar du bcings na zhes bya ba ni gtums pa yin no //
analyzed: bar du bcings na zhes bya ba ni gtums pa yin no //
translated: “If bound in the middle” means if covered.

original: yid brtan pas len pa zhes bya ba ni yid brtan par gyur pas len pa yin no //
analyzed: yid brtan pas len pa zhes bya ba ni yid brtan par gyur pas len pa yin no //
translated: “Taken with confidence” means taken with trust.

original: sbyang zhes bya ba ni nas la sogs pa gzhug pa'i gnas spor rung ba yin no //
analyzed: sbyang zhes bya ba ni nas la sogs pa gzhug pa'i gnas spor rung ba yin no //
translated: “To be threshed” means to be fit for the place of threshing, such as barley, etc.

original: gang du bya ba dang bya ba shes pa ni 'jog mkhas pa dag dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gang du bya ba dang bya ba shes pa ni 'jog mkhas pa dag dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: “Knowing where to do what” means being skilled in placement, like those who are skilled.

original: grangs kyi cha ni bzhi dag yin zhes bya ba ni grangs dag gi cha bzhi dag yod pa yin no //
analyzed: grangs kyi cha ni bzhi dag yin zhes bya ba ni grangs dag gi cha bzhi dag yod pa yin no //
translated: “The four parts of number” means the four parts of numbers exist.

original: ji ste de'i cha gcig med ces bya ba ni cha gcig byin par ma gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ste de'i cha gcig med ces bya ba ni cha gcig byin par ma gyur pa yin no //
translated: If he says, “I don’t have a part of it,” he should be made to give up a part of it.

original: nags kyi sgrog tu gzhug par gyis zhes bya ba ni shing @128b skam po las byas pa'i gdos kyi ming can la gzhug par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: nags kyi sgrog tu gzhug par gyis zhes bya ba ni shing @128b skam po las byas pa'i gdos kyi ming can la gzhug par bya ba yin no //
translated: “Throw him into the forest” means he should be thrown into a dry riverbed.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni bram ze de gdos su bcug nas grangs kyis blang bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni bram ze de gdos su bcug nas grangs kyis blang bar bya ba yin no //
translated: “Then” means that, having thrown the brahmin into the dry riverbed, he should be taken by the count.

original: gtsang sbra zhes bya ba ni sdig pa thams cad sbyong ba yin no //
analyzed: gtsang sbra zhes bya ba ni sdig pa thams cad sbyong ba yin no //
translated: “Purification” means the purification of all evil.

original: nga ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nga ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: “Except for me” and so on.

original: bdag gcig pu ma gtogs pa nyid ni thams cad kyi mchog kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bdag gcig pu ma gtogs pa nyid ni thams cad kyi mchog kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: “Only I” means that I am the best of all.

original: nye bar ma chod pas zhes bya ba ni pos par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar ma chod pas zhes bya ba ni pos par gyur pa'o //
translated: “Not having been sold” means not having been sold.

original: btsong bar bya ba yin zhing tha snyad du bya ba yin pas na zong zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: btsong bar bya ba yin zhing tha snyad du bya ba yin pas na zong zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: “Merchandise” is that which is to be sold and traded.

original: rigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rigs pa ni 'dir skyes bu'i sems mgu par byed pa la mkhas pa nyid gzung ngo //
analyzed: rigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rigs pa ni 'dir skyes bu'i sems mgu par byed pa la mkhas pa nyid gzung ngo //
translated: Skill in the means is the ability to please the minds of people.

original: dul ba ni lus ngag gi spyod pa dul ba yin no //
analyzed: dul ba ni lus ngag gi spyod pa dul ba yin no //
translated: Discipline is the discipline of bodily and vocal conduct.

original: rgya che ba ni rgya che ba la mos pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: rgya che ba ni rgya che ba la mos pa nyid yin no //
translated: Magnanimity is the aspiration for the great.

original: nor byed pa'i ngang tshul can nyid ni mthun pa yin no //
analyzed: nor byed pa'i ngang tshul can nyid ni mthun pa yin no //
translated: The nature of a swindler is to be deceitful.

original: brtse ba ni rnam par brtse ba yin no //
analyzed: brtse ba ni rnam par brtse ba yin no //
translated: Affection is the desire to help.

original: kha gsag ces bya ba ni yal 'dzugs par byed pas na gzhan slu bar byed pa'i tshig brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: kha gsag ces bya ba ni yal 'dzugs par byed pas na gzhan slu bar byed pa'i tshig brjod pa yin no //
translated: Flattery is the expression of words that deceive others by praising them.

original: brdzun ni brdzun du smra bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: brdzun ni brdzun du smra bar byed pa'o //
translated: Lying is the speaking of falsehoods.

original: skyes bu mkhas pa ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad la byang ba yin no //
analyzed: skyes bu mkhas pa ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad la byang ba yin no //
translated: The wise man is one who is skilled in worldly conventions.

original: 'phyis pa ni yun ring por 'gro ba yin no //
analyzed: 'phyis pa ni yun ring por 'gro ba yin no //
translated: Delay is the postponement of a promise for a long time.

original: dpyod pa ni rnam par 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: dpyod pa ni rnam par 'byed pa'o //
translated: Discernment is the analysis of the meaning of the scriptures.

original: bslus nas zhes bya ba ni nor sbyin pa'i khas blangs pa'i sgo nas chags pa bskyed pa ste bslus pa yin no ;
analyzed: bslus nas zhes bya ba ni nor sbyin pa'i khas blangs pa'i sgo nas chags pa bskyed pa ste bslus pa yin no ;
translated: Having deceived means having generated attachment through the promise to give wealth.

original: / nongs pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi gtso bo la rgyab kyis phyogs pa bas pa yin no //
analyzed: / nongs pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi gtso bo la rgyab kyis phyogs pa bas pa yin no //
translated: The phrase a transgression means a violation of one's own superior attitude.

original: nga mi bde'o zhes bya ba ni nga na'o zhes so //
analyzed: nga mi bde'o zhes bya ba ni nga na'o zhes so //
translated: The phrase I am not well means I am sick.

original: mtho btsams par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni gtsod par bgyi ba'o //
analyzed: mtho btsams par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni gtsod par bgyi ba'o //
translated: The phrase I will make amends means I will make a reparation.

original: me tog phreng gis zhes bya ba ni me tog gi phreng bas brgyan par gyur nas so //
analyzed: me tog phreng gis zhes bya ba ni me tog gi phreng bas brgyan par gyur nas so //
translated: The phrase wearing a garland of flowers means adorned with a garland of flowers.

original: kha sbu bregs pa ni kha spu bregs pa yin no //🔽ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar la 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: kha sbu bregs pa ni kha spu bregs pa yin no // ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar la 'jug pa yin no //
translated: The phrase shaved head means shaved hair.🔽The phrase alas! means how amazing!

original: glo ba lcogs so zhes bya ba ni blo sgrin pa yin no //
analyzed: glo ba lcogs so zhes bya ba ni blo sgrin pa yin no //
translated: The phrase I am ashamed means I am embarrassed.

original: khyim gyi rgyud ces bya ba ni gnyen gyis 'brel pa yin no //
analyzed: khyim gyi rgyud ces bya ba ni gnyen gyis 'brel pa yin no //
translated: The phrase family means relatives.

original: dran pa ni sngon byas pa dran pa dang bya ba dran pa yin no //
analyzed: dran pa ni sngon byas pa dran pa dang bya ba dran pa yin no //
translated: The phrase mindfulness means remembrance of what was done in the past and remembrance of what is to be done in the future.

original: shes bzhin ni las su bya ba yongs su gcod par byed pa yin no /
analyzed: shes bzhin ni las su bya ba yongs su gcod par byed pa yin no /
translated: The phrase awareness means the discernment of what is to be done.

original: mkhas pa ni 'dir bya ba la byang ba yin no //
analyzed: mkhas pa ni 'dir bya ba la byang ba yin no //
translated: The phrase skillful means skilled in action.

original: gsal ba ni rtog pa la mkhas pa yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba ni rtog pa la mkhas pa yin no //
translated: The phrase clear means skilled in thought.

original: yid gzhungs pa ni myur du yongs su shes pa yin no //
analyzed: yid gzhungs pa ni myur du yongs su shes pa yin no //
translated: The intelligent are those who understand quickly.

original: 'jig rten gyi chos can ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos can ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du bya ba yin no //
translated: Those who are worldly are those who are engaged in worldly affairs.

original: brtson pa ni le lo med pa yin no //
analyzed: brtson pa ni le lo med pa yin no //
translated: Those who are diligent are those who are free from laziness.

original: skye gnas gzhan du 'gro bar byed pa'i rnam grangs kyis @129a * //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: skye gnas gzhan du 'gro bar byed pa'i rnam grangs kyis @129a * // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The phrase who are born from another womb is a synonym for who are born from a womb.🔽The phrase who are born from another womb is a synonym for who are born from a womb.

original: ji ltar rig phyed las brgyud pas 'ongs pa'i cho ga las skye gnas gzhan las skyes pa la skye gnas gzhan nas skyes pas me skor byas pa yin pa de ltar byas pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar rig phyed las brgyud pas 'ongs pa'i cho ga las skye gnas gzhan las skyes pa la skye gnas gzhan nas skyes pas me skor byas pa yin pa de ltar byas pa yin no //
translated: Just as a person who is born from a womb is called born from another womb because he or she is born from a womb that is different from his or her own body, in the same way, a person who is born from an egg is also called born from another womb because he or she is born from an egg that is different from his or her own body.

original: de bag med pas logs shig tu song ba las khras khyer te zhes bya ba ni stobs kyis khyer zhing phrogs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de bag med pas logs shig tu song ba las khras khyer te zhes bya ba ni stobs kyis khyer zhing phrogs par gyur pa'o //
translated: The phrase who are carried off by a hawk means that they are carried off by a hawk and seized by force.

original: lcags kyi dog le ni khur ba la sogs pa 'tshod pa'i thabs su gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: lcags kyi dog le ni khur ba la sogs pa 'tshod pa'i thabs su gyur pa yin no //
translated: The phrase an iron pot refers to a cooking vessel.

original: khur ba rnam pa mang po ni khur ba yin no //
analyzed: khur ba rnam pa mang po ni khur ba yin no //
translated: The phrase many kinds of food refers to various kinds of food.

original: drug dang sbyar ba zhes bya ba ni de dag dug bsres par gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: drug dang sbyar ba zhes bya ba ni de dag dug bsres par gyur pa yin no //
translated: The phrase mixed with poison means that they are mixed with the poison of the afflictions.

original: grags zin na zhes bya ba ni sgra 'di gsal por gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: grags zin na zhes bya ba ni sgra 'di gsal por gyur pa yin no //
translated: The phrase already known means that the sound is clear.

original: lto ci ni rang bzhin yongs su bcad par dka' ba yin no //
analyzed: lto ci ni rang bzhin yongs su bcad par dka' ba yin no //
translated: The phrase difficult to understand means that the nature of things is difficult to comprehend.

original: blo gros ngan pa zhes bya ba ni blo gros mi bzang par gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: blo gros ngan pa zhes bya ba ni blo gros mi bzang par gyur pa yin no //
translated: The phrase bad intellect means that the intellect is not good.

original: mthong ba ni mig gis yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba ni mig gis yin no //
translated: The phrase seen with the eyes means that it is seen with the eyes.

original: thos pa ni rna bas yin no //
analyzed: thos pa ni rna bas yin no //
translated: The phrase heard with the ears means that it is heard with the ears.

original: shes pa ni yid kyis yin no //
analyzed: shes pa ni yid kyis yin no //
translated: The phrase cognized with the mind means that it is cognized with the mind.

original: don yongs su sgrub pa zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'i don bsgrubs pa yin no //
analyzed: don yongs su sgrub pa zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'i don bsgrubs pa yin no //
translated: The phrase accomplishing the aims of beings means that the aims of beings are accomplished.

original: bdag lam brnyas shig ces bya ba ni bdag la brnyas pa med par gyur par shog shig ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bdag lam brnyas shig ces bya ba ni bdag la brnyas pa med par gyur par shog shig ces bya ba yin no //
